entities.name: beauxbatons
entities.description: Fleur mentions Beauxbatons as a school with a different way of doing things.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is the one who is talking about Beauxbatons.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione points out three black specks in the sky through the kitchen window.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron joins Hermione at the window to look at the owls.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry hastens to join Hermione at the window to look at the owls.

entities.name: the burrow
entities.description: The owls are flying directly at The Burrow.

relationships.description: The owls are flying directly at The Burrow, which Hermione is holding onto.
The owls are flying directly at The Burrow, which Ron is also holding onto.
The owls are flying directly at The Burrow, which Harry is also holding onto.
Hermione is gripping Ron tightly around the elbows.
Hermione is also holding onto Harry tightly.
